mapper.insert: insert into tblUsed_product (seq, subject, price, name, content, productStatus, trade, regDate, status, viewCount, delFlag, memberSeq, categorySeq) values(seqUsed_product.nextVal, #{subject}, #{price}, #{name}, #{content}, #{productStatus}, #{trade}, sysdate, '판매 중', 0, 0, #{seq}, #{categorySeq})
